author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: Like much of the Caribbean, this drink has French influences. Thank goodness for Admiral Rodney.
name: Cuban Cocktail No.3
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
